summary: This bill, S. 525, proposes to transfer the functions, duties, responsibilities, assets, and liabilities related to the Food for Peace Act from the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) to the Department of Agriculture. This includes all aspects of implementing and administering the Act. The bill outlines provisions for reference changes, regulatory amendments, and continued operations of the Famine Early Warning Systems Network, with the Secretary of Agriculture consulting with the Secretary of State.
